request.name: attach
request.description: Attaches the associated HTML5 array buffer to the compositor. The array buffer size should be the same the one used to create this buffer. After attaching, the buffer can not be used for writing anymore by the client.

arg.name: contents
arg.summary: HTML5 array buffer to attach to the compositor.

event.name: detach
event.description: Detaches the associated HTML5 array buffer from the compositor and returns it to the client so it can be reused again for writing.

arg.name: contents
arg.summary: HTML5 array buffer detached from the compositor

interface.name: web_shm
interface.description:
A singleton global object that provides support for shared memory.
Clients can create wl_buffer objects using the create_buffer request.

request.name: create_web_array_buffer
request.description:
Create a web_array_buffer object.
The buffer is created using width and height as specified. The format of the attached buffer is always rgba8888.
A compositor will emit the detach event in conjunction with a wl_buffer release event.

request.name: create_buffer
request.description: Create a wl_buffer object from a web_array_buffer so it can be used with a surface.
